Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  shr.test


Entry: TypeConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:  "This tests a cardinality and a type constraint on Complex.Simple"
Property: Complex 0..1
          Complex.Simple 1..2
          Complex.Simple substitute Simple2

Element:      Complex
Property:     Simple 0..1

Element:      Simple
Value:        string

Element:      Simple2
Parent:       Simple
Value:        string
